title: Handle Hatch Cover Operations
description: Before loading containers into a vessel's hold, the large hatch covers must be removed.

tasks.description: The foreman instructs the crane operator to remove the hatch covers for a specific bay.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crane operator receives the instruction for Bay 10.

tasks.description: The crane operator uses a special lifting frame to attach to the hatch cover.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crane safely connects to the hatch cover.

tasks.description: The hatch cover is lifted and placed in a designated storage area on the quay.
tasks.expected_outcome: The hatch cover is safely stored, clearing the way for cargo operations in the hold.
